title: Sunset Dreams
lyrics:
As the sun sets low
And the stars begin to glow
Dreams take flight in the night
Guided by the moonlight

title: Whispering Winds
lyrics:
Whispering winds through the trees
Carrying tales on the breeze
Softly spoken, secrets shared
In the quiet evening air

title: Ocean Waves
lyrics:
Waves crashing on the shore
A melody we can't ignore
Rhythmic dance, ebb and flow
Nature's song, a soothing show

title: Mountain High
lyrics:
Climbing mountains, reaching high
Touch the clouds, kiss the sky
Every step, a journey new
With the peak in clear view

title: City Lights
lyrics:
City lights, shining bright
Neon signs, in the night
Heartbeat quickens with the beat
Dancing in the busy street

title: Rainy Day
lyrics:
Raindrops fall, soft and light
Creating music through the night
Pitter-patter on the ground
A soothing, calming sound

title: Summer Breeze
lyrics:
Summer breeze, warm and kind
Memories in the sunshine
Lazy days and starry nights
Everything feels so right

title: Under the Stars
lyrics:
Under the stars, we find our place
In the quiet, in the space
Whispers of the universe
In the silence, we immerse

title: Forest Path
lyrics:
Walking down the forest path
Leaves crunch softly, nature's bath
Birds sing sweetly, all around
In this haven, peace is found

title: Journey's End
lyrics:
Every road leads to an end
Where the heart and spirit mend
Lessons learned and stories told
In our hearts, we hold them bold
